text: Apana palanakartara pathera prati ahabana karuna jnanera katha bujhiye o upadesa suniye uttamarupe ebam tadera sathe bitarka karuna pachanda yukta panthaya. Niscaya apanara palanakarta'i ai byakti samparke bisesa bhabe jnata rayechena, ye tamra patha theke bicyuta haye pareche ebam tini'i bhala janena taderake, yara sathika pathe ache.
